item.title: Sword & Citadel: The Second Half of The Book of the New Sun
Shadow & Claw: The First Half of The Book of the New Sun
item.description: Shadow & Claw is an omnibus containing the first half of Gene Wolfe’s Book of the New Sun which is a far future sci-fi fantasy epic following the story of Severian the torturer, a self described insane person who has trouble differentiating between reality, his memories and his dreams.

item.title: A Canticle for Leibowitz
item.description:
Part 1: Amazing. Seems like this could have easily been an inspiration for the old school Fallout games I’ve always loved. Following one monk through the post-apocalypse is cool.

Part 2: Gigantic shift in tone. A less personal, more political story takes hold. Kind of hard to get through. The shift was really jarring.

Part 3: I haven’t gotten that far yet.
